title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Donate               Volunteer               Support Your Park         Â    Multiple opportunities exist for you to get involved with the park.  Learn more about how you can help and more about the management of the park when you explore this website.  Donate Support your park by making a philanthropic contribution to help us tell the story of these amazing men who we honor.   Volunteering From mowing grass to greeting visitors at the front door, Volunteers (VIP's) are essential to the operation of each and every national park.   Support Your Park Be a responsible visitor and learn how to show your support for your national parks.
